title: Scaffolding-Based Pedagogy Workshop for Digital Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Classroom setting with digital device (tablet/laptop) support requiring collaborative and hands-on activity spaces for learners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more assessment strategies by applying Bloom’s Digital Taxonomy in digital learning environments
Learners can structure two or more progressive learning activities tailored to their proficiency levels using scaffolding approaches
Learners can develop one or more job-integrated digital learning modules in scientific fields
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
